name: End Of Time (AymarX)
description:
Can you protect humanity from the End of Time itself?

An ancient relic has started to become unstable. You must bind the relic while fending off demons that want to destroy it. Who knows what evil might be unleashed once the crystal is destroyed?

HOW TO PLAY:

The main goal of the game is to fight off as many demons possible to get a higher score. You must protect yourself and the orb as long as you can. (Secret Tip: When in confusion, prioritize your health.) The grey bar keeps running out and you must step on the designated area and press SPACE to refill it.

DO NOT  RUN INTO THE ENEMIES AS THEY WILL CAUSE YOU DAMAGE.

CONTROLS:

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Fire at enemies.

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON OR SPACE: To refill the stability of the orb while standing on the designated area.

WASD OR ARROW KEYS: Movement.

Have fun! Can you find the secret boss battle? ;)
